content: {"name": "BLESSED SACRAMENT PANTRY", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Temporary address is at clinton place  between the church  and the convent  because the are undergoing renovations.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.bsscb.org/ministrylistings", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "620 Clinton Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Upper Clinton Hill", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07108", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7226009, "longitude": -74.2064588}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 824-6549", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on Christmas & New Year"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
